title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Condo living, the spread of AIDS through prostitutes and veterinary surgery.” [From a schedule of TV interviews in the Miami Herald, 4 February 1987. Submitted by Edward T. Howard, Delary Beach, Florida.]
